propositions.text: The story is a legend of courage, wisdom, and growth set in a harsh desert environment.
Life in the desert is fragile, and hope is scarce, yet human spirit perseveres like the resilient poplar tree.
The narrative follows Ali, a young boy, through his journey of loss, discovery, and transformation in the desert.
Ali gets separated from his tribe during a sandstorm, marking the beginning of his trials.
Ali encounters a hermit who imparts ancient desert knowledge and tests his resilience.
Through trials, Ali learns to navigate by stars, conserve water, and coexist with the desert.
Ali discovers an ancient ruin with secrets of a lost civilization and a mysterious power.
This discovery transforms Ali into a figure of legend as he returns to his tribe with newfound wisdom.
Ali's return brings hope and renewal to his tribe, improving their living conditions.
Ali inscribes his knowledge on a stone monument, ensuring his legacy endures in the desert.
